column4: Do I have to install an extra repo to do sudo apt-get install xubuntu-desktop ?
Do I have to install an extra repo to do sudo apt-get install xubuntu-desktop ?
Well I just installed ubuntu server edition, added my ethernet connection. Internet works fine. When i run 'sudo apt-get install xubuntu-desktop' it says package ... not found
do you have the internet repos installed or just the cd
not sure, what file has the repos listed in it?
give me a minute, and I'll tell you the error
ndisgtk is something you want too maybe
it is a gui for ndiswrapper
